mapper.sql: cisa.id, cisa.academyrank_title AS "title", cisa.academyrank_xAxis AS "xAxis", cisa.academyrank_data AS "data", cisa.remarks, cisa.del_flag, cisa.create_by AS "createBy.id", cisa.create_date, cisa.update_by AS "updateBy.id", cisa.update_date
mapper.select: SELECT cisa.academyrank_xAxis AS "xAxis" FROM mht_portal.cms_index_show_academyrank cisa
SELECT cisa.academyrank_data AS "data" FROM mht_portal.cms_index_show_academyrank cisa
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mht_portal.cms_index_show_academyrank( id, academyrank_title academyrank_xAxis, academyrank_data, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{xAxis}, #{data}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
